short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Efficiently manage your X account. Bulk delete posts, remove replies, undo reposts, and unlike content with just one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take control of your X (formerly Twitter) account with our powerful bulk management tool. Whether you're looking to clean up your old posts, remove engagement history, or start fresh, X Account Manager Pro makes it effortless.

âœ¨ KEY FEATURES:
- Bulk Delete Posts - Remove multiple posts quickly
- Clean Up Replies - Delete your reply history efficiently
- Undo Reposts - Remove multiple reposts at once
- Unlike All - Bulk remove likes from posts
- Complete Cleanup - Wipe everything with one click
- User-friendly Interface - Simple and intuitive design
- Fast & Efficient - Optimized for speed
- Privacy Focused - Works directly in your browser
